resources.string: Look we are supposed to be winning the hearts and the minds of the natives. Isn't that the whole point of your little puppet show? You look like them and you talk like them and they will start trusting us. We built them a school, we teach them english but after that. How many years?
Welcome to Mobile OCR. Tap and hold the screen for instructions.
Fling up or down to change modes. Tap to play or pause current text. Fling left and right to navigate text. Double tap to play continuously. Tap and hold to repeat the instructions
Long Press on screen to disable or enable this instruction.
